title: Rumble is corki no joke same abilitys xD
body:
Q is the same
W is the same
E is the same
Rumble ultimate is corki's passive
What's the difference I do not mind. Just in relation I was wondering if anybody noticed..

replies.body:
Last I checked........
Corkie throws a bomb with Q not use a flamethrower.
Corkie dashes with his W, dropping bombs between, not gain a large amount of movement speed while gaining a shield.
Corkie with his E is firing a gatling gun that drops magic resist and armour, Rumble's E causes him to fire a spear that slows enemies down. 

I don't even think there's a similiarity... :l

Corki's E is rumbles Q
Both of there W is a getaway
Rumbles E (super galaxy rumble) is corki's ultimate
And rumbles ultimate is corki's passive
They're all the same just different animations.

corki e is shredding mixed damage from a gattling, rumble shoots magic fire
corki w is dash over walls, rumble w is a shield with a speed boost
corki rockets don't slow, and they are aoe
corki w is similar to rumbles ult, corki passive knocks and slows, slow/damage ratios different
corki passive makes damaged mixed, rumble ult doesnt
corki animations are most definitely different, they share characteristics, and look similar, but they are different, the only thing you could really match is empowered w and rumble ult, but even then rumbles has cracks left while corki is a line of fire
Oh, well, when you put it like that... nope.
Explain the how you do not see the resemblance in any of the things placed together?

They're different enough. 
Main differences: 
Corki has a dash. 
Rumble has a movespeed boost. 
Corki has a long range poke ability. 
Rumble has more of a DoT Braum ultimate. 
Corki's Gatling Gun shreds armor and MR and is DoT.
Whilst Rumble's deals DoT magic dmg. 
Corki can throw a bomb that grants vision. 
Rumble has mid range slow skillshot. 

Actually everything they have is different. ggwp

>
> Q is the same
